languages.text: "Деус Механикус!" {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g} решается оглядеть вас получше, после чего прерывисто вздыхает и находит в себе силы унять дрожь.{/n} "Он услышал мои молитвы... я думал, что остался в одиночестве среди царства безумия и порока! Молю, спасите меня!"

traits.locale_text: "Деус Механикус!" {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g} решается оглядеть вас получше, после чего прерывисто вздыхает и находит в себе силы унять дрожь.{/n} "Он услышал мои молитвы... я думал, что остался в одиночестве среди царства безумия и порока! Молю, спасите меня!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} decides to take a better look at you, after which he lets out a ragged breath and manages to subdue his shaking.{/n} "He heard my prayers... I thought I was alone in a kingdom of madness and depravity! Please, save me!"
languages.original_text: "Деус Механикус!" {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g} решается оглядеть вас получше, после чего прерывисто вздыхает и находит в себе силы унять дрожь.{/n} "Он услышал мои молитвы... я думал, что остался в одиночестве среди царства безумия и порока! Молю, спасите меня!"

traits.locale_text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}The tech-priest decides to take a better look at you, after which he lets out a ragged breath and manages to subdue his shaking.{/n} "He heard my prayers... I thought I was alone in a kingdom of madness and depravity! Please, save me!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

I thought I was alone in a kingdom of madness and depravity! Please, save me!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

traits.locale_text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} decides to take a better look at you, after which he lets out a ragged breath and manages to subdue his shaking.{/n} "He heard my prayers... I thought I was alone in a kingdom of madness and depravity! Please, save me!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: “万机之神在上！” {n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}仔细打量了你一眼，之后吐出一口粗气，努力抑制住了颤抖。{/n}“祂听到了我的祈祷……我以为这个疯狂与堕落的王国中只有我一个正常人！求求你，救救我吧！”
languages.original_text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} decides to take a better look at you, after which he lets out a ragged breath and manages to subdue his shaking.{/n} "He heard my prayers... I thought I was alone in a kingdom of madness and depravity! Please, save me!"

traits.locale_text: “万机之神在上！” {n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}仔细打量了你一眼，之后吐出一口粗气，努力抑制住了颤抖。{/n}“祂听到了我的祈祷……我以为这个疯狂与堕落的王国中只有我一个正常人！求求你，救救我吧！”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: «¡Deus Mechanicus!». {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} decide observaros con más detenimiento, tras lo cual deja escapar un suspiro entrecortado y consigue detener su temblor. {/n} «Ha oído mis plegarias... ¡Pensé que estaba solo en un reino de locura y depravación! ¡Por favor, sálvenme!».
languages.original_text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} decides to take a better look at you, after which he lets out a ragged breath and manages to subdue his shaking.{/n} "He heard my prayers... I thought I was alone in a kingdom of madness and depravity! Please, save me!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Deus Mechanicus!». {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} decide observaros con más detenimiento, tras lo cual deja escapar un suspiro entrecortado y consigue detener su temblor. {/n} «Ha oído mis plegarias... ¡Pensé que estaba solo en un reino de locura y depravación! ¡Por favor, sálvenme!».
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: 「デウス・メカニクス！」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}はあなたをもっとしっかりと見ようと、荒い息を吐いて震えを抑えた。{/n}「主は私の祈りを聞きとどけた。狂気と堕落の王国で孤独だと思っていた私の祈りを！どうか、救いを！」
languages.original_text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} decides to take a better look at you, after which he lets out a ragged breath and manages to subdue his shaking.{/n} "He heard my prayers... I thought I was alone in a kingdom of madness and depravity! Please, save me!"

traits.locale_text: 「デウス・メカニクス！」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}はあなたをもっとしっかりと見ようと、荒い息を吐いて震えを抑えた。{/n}「主は私の祈りを聞きとどけた。狂気と堕落の王国で孤独だと思っていた私の祈りを！どうか、救いを！」
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} beschließt, dich genauer zu betrachten, und danach atmet er keuchend aus und unterdrückt sein Zittern.{/n} "Er hat meine Gebete erhört ... Ich dachte schon, ich wäre ganz alleine in einem Königreich voller Wahnsinn und Verderbtheit! Bitte rettet mich!"
languages.original_text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} decides to take a better look at you, after which he lets out a ragged breath and manages to subdue his shaking.{/n} "He heard my prayers... I thought I was alone in a kingdom of madness and depravity! Please, save me!"

traits.locale_text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} beschließt, dich genauer zu betrachten, und danach atmet er keuchend aus und unterdrückt sein Zittern.{/n} "Er hat meine Gebete erhört ... Ich dachte schon, ich wäre ganz alleine in einem Königreich voller Wahnsinn und Verderbtheit! Bitte rettet mich!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: « Deus Mechanicus ! » {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} se hasarde à vous regarder de plus près, après quoi il laisse échapper un soupir rauque et parvient à calmer ses tremblements.{/n} « Il a entendu mes prières... Je croyais avoir été abandonné dans cet antre de folie et de dépravation ! Je vous en supplie, sauvez-moi ! »
languages.original_text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} decides to take a better look at you, after which he lets out a ragged breath and manages to subdue his shaking.{/n} "He heard my prayers... I thought I was alone in a kingdom of madness and depravity! Please, save me!"

traits.locale_text: « Deus Mechanicus ! » {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} se hasarde à vous regarder de plus près, après quoi il laisse échapper un soupir rauque et parvient à calmer ses tremblements.{/n} « Il a entendu mes prières... Je croyais avoir été abandonné dans cet antre de folie et de dépravation ! Je vous en supplie, sauvez-moi ! »
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, sana yakından bakmak istiyor. Ardından hırıltılı bir nefes verip titreyişini bastırmayı başarıyor.{/n} "Dualarımı duymuş... Bu delilik ve mahrumiyet âleminde bir başımayım sanıyordum! Yalvarırım, kurtarın beni!"
languages.original_text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} decides to take a better look at you, after which he lets out a ragged breath and manages to subdue his shaking.{/n} "He heard my prayers... I thought I was alone in a kingdom of madness and depravity! Please, save me!"

traits.locale_text: "Deus Mechanicus!" {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, sana yakından bakmak istiyor. Ardından hırıltılı bir nefes verip titreyişini bastırmayı başarıyor.{/n} “Dualarımı duymuş... Bu delilik ve mahrumiyet âleminde bir başımayım sanıyordum! Yalvarırım, kurtarın beni!”
